message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you our premium product! I'm willing to offer it to you for $110. This is a great deal, considering its value to you is $120.

Thanks for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the value you're offering, $110 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable paying. I'm willing to pay $105 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
I understand your concerns, Bob, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to lower the price to $108. This is the best I can do, considering the value I have in the product.
